channel.title: Birdwatching on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Birdwatching on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: An artist took birdwatching for a ride, To see if a new passion could reside. In awe of the feathered, The artist was tethered To the beauty …
